solution.text:
let us say boys at base level be \(a_1=_{j}_\)
we know that the decrement(d) in the number of boys is \(d=-2\)
Using the formula \(a_n=a_1+(n-1)*d\) where \(a_n=2\)
\(2=_{j}_+(n-1)(-2)\)
On solving we get n=_{{Decimal('0.5')*j}}_
The no. of levels in the formation is equal to \(n =_{{Decimal('0.5')*j}}_\)

content.text:
In a gymnastic formation _{j}_ boys sit in a row at the base level.
_{{j-2}}_ boys symmetrically sit on the shoulders of the boys at the base level.
Similary _{{j-4}}_ boys sit on the shoulders of these _{{j-2}}_ boys.
Boys sit in the same pattern forming a vertical triangle with 2 boys at the topmost level.
Considering the topmost level as the last level, find the number of levels in the gymnastic formation?
